content.Mon: You look hurt #$q 980/981 heal_followup#Would you like me to heal you?#$r 980 0 heal_yes#Sure, why not?#$r 981 0 heal_no#No thank you.
content.heal_yes: Okay let me patch you up.
content.heal_followup: $p 980#You're all patched up!|Let me know if you need some healing
